title: Android app deals of the day: Heroes of Flatlandia, Barcode PRO, Cyberlords, more
content:
It is now time for this afternoon’s Google Android game and app deals. Joining price drops on Motorola’s new Edge+ smartphone and Samsung Galaxy Watch 4, you’ll find everything waiting down below. Headliner offers include titles like Heroes of Flatlandia, QR/Barcode Scanner PRO, KORG Kaossilator for Android, Cyberlords – Arcology, and more. Hit the jump for a complete look at today’s best Android app deals. 

more…
